summary: MY WINDSHIELD WIPERS HAVE NOT WORKED WELL FOR OVER A YEAR.  THE MOTOR AND SWITCH IS SOUND BUT THE CIRCUIT BOARD  DOES NOT SEND THE SIGNAL TO ACTIVATE THE WIPERS EITHER AT NORMAL SPEED, HIGH SPEED, OR INTERMITTENT.  IT ALSO WILL NOT ACTIVATE THE FLUID WASHER THOUGH ITS MOTOR IS SOUND.  PLEASE ADD MY YEAR TO THE RECALL INVESTIGATION. *JB
